title: Dmitri Chugunov
text:
Dmitri Vyacheslavovich Chugunov (; born 9 June 1968) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Top%20League">Soviet Top League</a> in 1986 for <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Moscow">FC Torpedo Moscow</a>.
From 1992 to 2005 he was a professional <a href="futsal">futsal</a> player.
European club competitions.
With <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Moscow">FC Torpedo Moscow</a>.
